entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow inland and over higher terrain this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
